translation.en: [Cian] Can you tell me about your dating history?
translation.zh: ‎能跟我说说你的恋爱史吗？

translation.en: My dating history?
translation.zh: ‎我的恋爱史？

translation.en: [chuckles] What? Oh, I don't have any. What?
translation.zh: ‎啊？我根本没有 什么啊？

translation.en: Is that a serious question?
translation.zh: ‎这问题是认真的吗？

translation.en: I've never been on a date before.
translation.zh: ‎我从来没有约过会

translation.en: Something always seems to either go wrong
translation.zh: ‎每次总会出现些什么问题 或者…

translation.en: or… kind of trigger my flight reflex.
translation.zh: ‎每次总会出现些什么问题 或者… ‎发生什么触发我逃跑反射的事

translation.en: I never had a girlfriend, not even when I was in high school.
translation.zh:
‎我从没交过女朋友
‎连我上高中时都没有

translation.en: I'm on my quest for true love, and I cannot give up on that.
translation.zh:
‎我这是在追寻真爱
‎我是绝对不会放弃的

translation.en: [narrator] Finding love can be hard for anyone.
translation.zh: ‎对任何人来说 要找到爱都是很难的

translation.en: You don't force love. You just let it come to you.
translation.zh:
‎爱情是强迫不来的
‎你只能让它来找你

translation.en: I'll remember that. Thanks.
translation.zh: ‎这句话我记住了 谢谢

translation.en: [narrator] And for some people, it can feel like an impossible dream.
translation.zh:
‎而对有些人来说
‎这感觉几乎是一个不可能实现的梦想

translation.en: I'm 30, and I thought I would've had a girlfriend by now.
translation.zh:
‎我30岁了 本以为到了这个年纪
‎我肯定已经交过女朋友了

translation.en: [Sharnae] Wow! Holy shit!
translation.zh: ‎哇！天呐！

translation.en: [narrator] This series follows young adults on the autism spectrum…
translation.zh:
‎本剧集跟随数名
‎处于自闭症谱系中的年轻人…

translation.en: Say hello to my future husband or wife.
translation.zh: ‎来跟我将来的丈夫或妻子打个招呼

translation.en: Hello, there.
translation.zh: ‎你好呀

translation.en: [narrator] …as they navigate the confusing world of relationships and dating.
translation.zh:
‎…见证他们摸爬滚打于
‎恋爱与约会的复杂世界中

translation.en: -What's your age limit? -Seventy.
translation.zh:
‎-你最老能接受多大的？
‎-70

translation.en: [narrator] From first dates…
translation.zh: ‎从初次约会…

translation.en: Just I'm trying to, um, make up conversation.
translation.zh: ‎我只是…想找个话题来聊

translation.en: [Jayden] It seems that she only would like to see me again as a friend.
translation.zh:
‎看来她以后再见我时
‎只会把我当朋友来对待了

translation.en: [narrator] …to the first sparks of romance…
translation.zh: ‎…到闪出浪漫史的第一道火花…

translation.en: -I've never been kissed by a girl. -[woman] Have you?
translation.zh: ‎我还从来没被女孩亲过

translation.en: She's perfect. Absolutely perfect.
translation.zh: ‎她是完美的 绝对的完美

translation.en: [narrator] …and happily ever after.
translation.zh: ‎…再到过上永远幸福的生活

translation.en: Welcome back, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎回来 女士们 先生们 ‎（迈克尔）

translation.en: This is series two of Love on the Spectrum.
translation.zh: ‎这里是《自闭也有爱》的第二季

translation.en: I don't really need to introduce myself because you al-- already know who I am.
translation.zh:
‎我其实不需要介绍自己
‎因为你们都已…已经知道我是谁了

translation.en: Michael, of course.
translation.zh: ‎当然就是迈克尔了

translation.en: -[Cian] Are you glad to be back, Michael? -Yes, I am. Definitely.
translation.zh:
‎-这次回来你高兴吗 迈克尔？
‎-嗯 高兴 绝对的

translation.en: [Cian] And why are you back?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么要回来呢？

translation.en: I'm continuing my-- my quest for true love.
translation.zh: ‎我要继续我…我对真爱的追寻

translation.en: [Cian] And you're just as keen to find someone special?
translation.zh:
‎你还是一样热衷于
‎找到那个特别的人？

translation.en: I don't feel any-- any less keen than what I did last year.
translation.zh:
‎我不觉得自己有…
‎有比去年少热衷一点

translation.en: In fact, if anything, it's kinda strengthened.
translation.zh: ‎应该说 反而比以前更热衷了

translation.en: I just can't bear the thought of being single my entire life
translation.zh: ‎我连想都不敢想 自己会单身一辈子

translation.en: because it's lonely. It's boring, and it's also unfulfilling.
translation.zh:
‎因为那样很孤单 很无聊
‎而且很没有成就感

translation.en: And it makes you feel like you lack a purpose.
translation.zh: ‎会让你觉得自己没有目标

translation.en: I can't see myself without a wife.
translation.zh: ‎我无法想象自己没有妻子

translation.en: There's no other way for me.
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 没有其他的活法

translation.en: [narrator] Michael lives with his family in Wollongong, New South Wales.
translation.zh:
‎迈克尔与他的家人一起
‎住在新南威尔士的伍伦贡

translation.en: [sister] Michael, can you open the jar for me?
translation.zh: ‎迈克尔 能帮我开个罐头吗？

translation.en: -[Michael] Yep. -Adam shut it too tight. Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-亚当拧得太紧了 ‎谢谢

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你

translation.en: I've been ignored by a lot of girls throughout my life,
translation.zh:
‎我活到现在
‎一直是被女孩们无视过来的

translation.en: and honestly, it's no fun.
translation.zh: ‎说实话 挺没意思的

translation.en: If they're not interested, they're not interested.
translation.zh: ‎要是她们不感兴趣的话 那也没办法

translation.en: -[Michael] Yeah. -What do you expect them to do?
translation.zh:
‎-是啊
‎-你想让她们怎么做？

translation.en: -[Michael scoffs] Nothing. -That's right.
translation.zh:
‎-不用怎么做
‎-没错

translation.en: So you've just gotta keep searching.
translation.zh: ‎你能做的 就是继续寻找罢了

translation.en: -Not every girl's gonna be interested. -[Michael] No.
translation.zh:
‎-不可能每个女孩都感兴趣
‎-对

translation.en: [sister] I think you should continue with your online dating.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你应该继续在网上相亲

translation.en: I don't think it's the answer for me.
translation.zh: ‎我不认为那…能解决我的问题

translation.en: Right now, maybe you feel that way because you've had no success with it,
translation.zh:
‎或许你现在这么认为
‎是因为你还没成功配对

translation.en: but I wouldn't close the door to it.
translation.zh: ‎换了我 是不会急着关上这扇门的

translation.en: Well, in 2018, I gave eHarmony 12 chances.
translation.zh:
‎反正在2018年中
‎我给了eHarmony十二次机会

translation.en: One chance per month.
translation.zh: ‎一月一次机会

translation.en: What if it was the 13th month that you would've--
translation.zh: ‎可要是你偏偏在第13月的时候…

translation.en: -There is no 13th month. -[laughing]
translation.zh: ‎根本没有第13月 一年里只有12月

translation.en: -There's only 12 months in a year. -I know.
translation.zh: ‎根本没有第13月 一年里只有12月 ‎我知道 但如果你坚持下去

translation.en: But if you kept going,
translation.zh: ‎我知道 但如果你坚持下去

translation.en: and on the 13th month that you were with eHarmony--
translation.zh: ‎然后在你上eHarmony的第13月…

translation.en: Mom, I decided if I didn't have any success by the end of the year,
translation.zh:
‎妈 我早决定好了
‎如果我不能在年末配上的话

translation.en: I would not continue my profile.
translation.zh: ‎我就不会再继续放我的资料了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好吧

translation.en: That was a waste of $240. I'm not doing that again.
translation.zh:
‎白白浪费了240元
‎我不会再干这种事了

translation.en: Because after all, I still have a house to save for.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟我还得存钱买房呢

translation.en: And I'm not gonna be able to buy it at this rate.
translation.zh: ‎这样下去我会买不起的

translation.en: I know. It all counts.
translation.zh: ‎我明白 积少成多

translation.en: Spending $200 on something valuable, like a crystal, for example,
translation.zh:
‎把200元花在有价值的东西上 ‎比如买块水晶什么的
‎那我倒是没什么意见

translation.en: that's something I'm actually cool with.
translation.zh:
‎比如买块水晶什么的
‎那我倒是没什么意见

translation.en: Hello, I'm Ronan.
translation.zh: ‎你好 我是罗南

translation.en: I'm 21 years of age.
translation.zh: ‎我今年21岁

translation.en: [Cian] Nice to meet you, Ronan.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴认识你 罗南

translation.en: Pleasure.
translation.zh: ‎幸会

translation.en: [Cian] Tell me a bit about yourself.
translation.zh: ‎跟我介绍一下你自己吧

translation.en: So I would describe myself as a kind,
translation.zh: ‎要我描述自己的话 ‎我是个对所有人都善良

translation.en: generous, helpful, polite man to every people.
translation.zh: ‎我是个对所有人都善良 ‎大方、爱帮忙、有礼貌的人

translation.en: [Cian] And what does autism mean for you? Like, how does autism affect you?
translation.zh:
‎对你来说 有自闭症意味着什么？
‎自闭症对你有什么影响？

translation.en: Sometimes I might have a bit of confusion,
translation.zh: ‎有时我可能会感到困惑

translation.en: and sometimes I might need a lot of help and support.
translation.zh: ‎有时我可能很需要别人的帮忙和照顾

translation.en: -[Cian] Have you ever been in love? -I've never been in love before.
translation.zh:
‎-你有恋爱过吗？
‎-我从来都没有恋爱过

translation.en: Really, like, it's just like my own-- it's my destiny.
translation.zh: ‎真的 这就像是我自己的… ‎这是我命中注定 那个…

translation.en: Like, really wanna find a girl that truly cares about me and loves me.
translation.zh:
‎这是我命中注定 那个… ‎真的很想找到一个
‎真正在乎我和爱我的女孩

translation.en: My dream girl would be, like-- like, wonderful and-- and splendid.
translation.zh:
‎我的梦中情人
‎要是一个非常好的人 然后… ‎要非常棒 然后…

translation.en: Like, she might have musical talents, like as much as I do.
translation.zh: ‎要非常棒 然后… ‎可能还有些音乐天赋 跟我一样

translation.en: [Cian] That was very nice. You're good at that.
translation.zh: ‎真好听 你弹得很不错

translation.en: You'll be able to impress a lady with that, I reckon.
translation.zh: ‎你应该能靠这一手来打动女人吧

translation.en: Yeah, I would be able to impress a lady.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我是可以靠这个来打动女人

translation.en: [narrator] Ronan lives with his parents and his older brother.
translation.zh: ‎罗南与他的父母和哥哥一起住

translation.en: Should I play something now?
translation.zh: ‎该轮到我来弹了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, get Jordan to play something. -[chuckles] He's good on the piano.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 让乔丹来弹点什么吧
‎他坐在钢琴边挺像样的

translation.en: -He'd be terrible. -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎他肯定会弹得很糟糕

translation.en: -Would he? Do you think so? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎会吗？你这么认为？

translation.en: [Ronan] He hasn't even played piano before.
translation.zh: ‎他根本从来没弹过钢琴

translation.en: No, but it's nice for me because I've got two sons with different skills.
translation.zh:
‎对 但这样挺不错的
‎我能有两个各怀不同技能的儿子

translation.en: -Yeah, different skills. -[mother] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-嗯 不同的技能
‎-是的

translation.en: [Cian] So what do you think about Ronan's desire to meet someone?
translation.zh:
‎你对罗南想找对象的愿望
‎有什么看法？

translation.en: I think it's great. I think this is the next phase in his life, really.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得挺棒的
‎我觉得这是他人生的下个阶段

translation.en: I mean, we've got through school and now found some employment,
translation.zh:
‎毕竟我们已经完成了学业
‎接着又找到了份工作

translation.en: and I think this is something that, you know, is really important to him.
translation.zh:
‎我认为这对他来说
‎是件非常重要的事

translation.en: I'll do whatever it takes to find a girlfriend.
translation.zh: ‎只要能找到女朋友 我做什么都愿意

translation.en: He's caring. He's kind. He's compassionate. He makes us laugh.
translation.zh: ‎他很贴心 又善良 ‎有同情心 经常逗我们笑

translation.en: He's come a long way.
translation.zh: ‎他的变化挺大的

translation.en: All of us in the family never dreamed that he would be at the stage he is now.
translation.zh:
‎我们家的人做梦也想不到
‎他会像现在这样登台表演

translation.en: We thought that he will be, most of the time,
translation.zh: ‎我们都以为 大多数情况下 ‎他会想要自己一个人独处

translation.en: just wanting to be on his own,
translation.zh: ‎他会想要自己一个人独处

translation.en: um, because when he was younger, that's pretty much what he wanted to do.
translation.zh: ‎因为他小时候基本上就只喜欢这样

translation.en: So the fact that now he'd like to have that special person
translation.zh: ‎所以现在的他会想找到那个特别的人

translation.en: that, you know, he can turn to--
translation.zh: ‎那个他可以依靠的人 这…

translation.en: I mean, he's come this far, which is amazing,
translation.zh:
‎他能有这么大的变化
‎这点挺让人惊叹的

translation.en: so there's no reason why he can't.
translation.zh: ‎所以他完全没有理由找不到

translation.en: [Ronan] When I do find a girlfriend, I just hope that,
translation.zh: ‎我希望等我真找到了女朋友

translation.en: by the time I get to know the girl a lot more, when I become older,
translation.zh:
‎等我多了解那个女孩后
‎等我再老一点

translation.en: I might-- I might get married to the girl,
translation.zh: ‎我可能…可能能娶了那个女孩

translation.en: and I might live in a--
translation.zh: ‎然后有可能住在…

translation.en: I might live in a house of my own with the girl.
translation.zh:
‎我有可能跟那个女孩一起
‎住在属于我自己的房子里

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好啊

translation.en: [Cian] Are you gonna be nervous when Ronan goes on his first date?
translation.zh:
‎罗南要去他的初次约会了
‎你会紧张吗？

translation.en: Of course! [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎当然啦！

translation.en: [sighs] I've been nervous all my life…
translation.zh: ‎我已经紧张了一辈子

translation.en: [laughs] …with everything that Ronan takes on.
translation.zh: ‎无论罗南做什么事

translation.en: -You know what you do every single time? -What?
translation.zh:
‎-但你知道你每次都怎么样吗？
‎-怎么样？

translation.en: You amaze me and surprise me how well you cope
translation.zh:
‎你总会让我惊叹 给我惊喜 ‎在处理各种新事物时
‎你能应对下来

translation.en: and how well you manage all the new things you do.
translation.zh:
‎在处理各种新事物时
‎你能应对下来 ‎能适应得这么好

translation.en: [Ronan] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是啊

translation.en: So I've kind of learned over the years
translation.zh: ‎所以这些年来 我算是慢慢学会了

translation.en: not to worry so much, because I know you're gonna be fine.
translation.zh:
‎让自己别太过担心
‎因为我知道你不会有事的

translation.en: -[Ronan] Yeah. -[mother] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: [Ronan] Yeah, I'm always gonna be fine.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我永远都不会有事的

translation.en: The main thing I want is for you to find the right person.
translation.zh: ‎我最想要的 就是你能找到对的人

translation.en: Do you wanna go and put some place mats out,
translation.zh: ‎你要不要去把餐具垫铺起来？

translation.en: and we'll go have some lunch?
translation.zh: ‎然后我们就好吃午餐了

translation.en: Do you think he's a good role model to learn off
translation.zh:
‎你觉得在跟他那些女朋友谈恋爱上
‎他是个学习的好榜样吗？

translation.en: when he's dating his girlfriends, or do you think you could do it better?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得在跟他那些女朋友谈恋爱上
‎他是个学习的好榜样吗？ ‎还是说你认为自己能做得更好？

translation.en: I make too many jokes, I think. I make too much fun of them.
translation.zh:
‎我玩笑开得太多了 我感觉
‎取笑她们的时候有点太过

translation.en: But I would do the right thing and make it all positive.
translation.zh:
‎但我肯定会做正确的事
‎让一切都很积极

translation.en: Hmm. That's right. You would. Any girl will be lucky to have you.
translation.zh:
‎没错 你肯定会的
‎哪个女孩能拥有你 绝对是她的福气

translation.en: And I hope she likes chicken.
translation.zh: ‎我希望她喜欢吃鸡肉

translation.en: And I sure hope that she likes meatballs, sausages and pizza as well.
translation.zh: ‎我希望她也喜欢吃肉丸、香肠和比萨

translation.en: When I see my brother hanging out with his girlfriend,
translation.zh: ‎当我看到我哥和他女朋友一起玩时

translation.en: it made me feel jealous. Like thinking…
translation.zh: ‎我会感到嫉妒 我会想：

translation.en: "Why does he get a girlfriend and not me?"
translation.zh: ‎“凭什么他有女朋友 而我没有？”

translation.en: [Cian] Hmm. Well, I'm sure you'll have a girlfriend one day.
translation.zh:
‎嗯 我相信总有一天
‎你会交到女朋友的

translation.en: Yeah, hopefully is all I can say.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我也只能说希望如此吧

translation.en: This is my bedroom.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的卧室

translation.en: There's, like, a lot of pictures around me, like V8 Supercars pictures.
translation.zh: ‎我被好多好多的照片围绕着 ‎比如V8引擎超跑的照片

translation.en: And even the bedsheet, it's like, "Born to race,"
translation.zh: ‎就连床单上也是 “生而为赛车”

translation.en: which includes the drivers. Like, they were born to race.
translation.zh:
‎这也包含了车手们
‎就是说他们天生就是赛车手

translation.en: For instance, Shane van Gisbergen.
translation.zh: ‎比如 肖恩范吉斯伯根

translation.en: He's good at drifting,
translation.zh: ‎他很擅长漂移

translation.en: and he's also good at doing burnouts as well.
translation.zh: ‎他还很擅长玩烧胎

translation.en: He's so crazy.
translation.zh: ‎他简直太疯狂了

translation.en: [Cian] What's drifting?
translation.zh: ‎漂移是什么？

translation.en: Drifting is like you burn the tires and smoke billows out,
translation.zh:
‎漂移就是当你让轮胎烧起来
‎然后会有烟冒出来

translation.en: and you're just like…
translation.zh: ‎然后你就这样…

translation.en: [Cian] So do you like drifting and burnouts?
translation.zh: ‎你喜欢漂移和烧胎吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, sure do, 'cause it's-- it's so hilarious.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 当然啦 因为那…那样很滑稽

translation.en: So hilarious to watch. It makes me laugh.
translation.zh: ‎看起来这是太滑稽了 我一看就想笑

translation.en: And then this is like a lamp.
translation.zh: ‎然后这里是一盏灯

translation.en: It used to be in Aladdin, the movie,
translation.zh:
‎它以前是在《阿拉丁神灯》
‎那部电影里的

translation.en: and sometimes if you rub it,
translation.zh: ‎有时候如果你擦一擦它

translation.en: you get to make a wish.
translation.zh: ‎就能让你许个愿

translation.en: Get this, for instance.
translation.zh: ‎你看 比如

translation.en: I'm rubbing.
translation.zh: ‎我这样擦

translation.en: I close my eyes and say,
translation.zh: ‎我闭上眼睛然后说

translation.en: "I wish to get a girlfriend of mine
translation.zh: ‎“我希望能找到一个女朋友

translation.en: who likes the same interests as much as I do."
translation.zh: ‎她跟我有同样的兴趣 跟我一样喜欢”

translation.en: [Cian] Sounds good. Well, hopefully it'll work.
translation.zh: ‎听起来不错嘛 希望能有用

translation.en: Hopefully it will.
translation.zh: ‎希望有用

translation.en: [Cian] How do you feel about living at home with your family?
translation.zh:
‎跟自己家人一起在同一个屋檐下住
‎你感觉如何？

translation.en: -I don't really enjoy it that much. -[Cian] Why not?
translation.zh:
‎-我并不那么喜欢
‎-为什么不呢？

translation.en: Women don't like to be married to men who still live with their parents
translation.zh:
‎女人可不喜欢嫁给
‎还跟父母住在一起的男人

translation.en: because it's kinda embarrassing.
translation.zh: ‎因为这有点难为情

translation.en: I'm four years away from turning 30.
translation.zh: ‎我还有4年就要30了

translation.en: For a while, I've been feeling like I'm still a boy
translation.zh:
‎好长一段时间以来
‎我都还觉得自己是个小男孩

translation.en: because… a boy needs-- needs his parents for company.
translation.zh: ‎因为… ‎小男孩才…才需要父母的陪伴

translation.en: A man needs a spouse.
translation.zh: ‎男人需要的是配偶

translation.en: [narrator] Michael is getting ready for a night of speed dating.
translation.zh: ‎迈克尔正在为今晚的闪电约会做准备

translation.en: -[Cian] What do you think? -Perfect.
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得怎么样？
‎-完美

translation.en: -[Cian] You excited about tonight? -Yep, definitely.
translation.zh:
‎-为今晚感到兴奋吗？
‎-嗯 当然了

translation.en: You could meet your million dollars tonight, Michael.
translation.zh: ‎你今晚有可能中百万大奖哦 迈克尔

translation.en: With any luck. Okay, Cian, um, how about this?
translation.zh: ‎运气好的话 ‎好嘞 基恩 这件怎么样？

translation.en: [Cian] Yeah, if you think that works. Why don't you ask your mom?
translation.zh:
‎可以 只要你觉得行的话
‎你为什么不问你妈呢？

translation.en: Whatever makes you feel good, just wear it.
translation.zh: ‎只要你穿上后感觉好就行

translation.en: This one I feel more comfortable in anyway.
translation.zh: ‎反正我穿这件比较自在一点

translation.en: You wear what you're comfortable in because that's when you're going to be at your best.
translation.zh:
‎那就穿这件 要穿让你自在的
‎因为这样你才能有最佳的状态

translation.en: -Yep. -[mother] So wear what you like.
translation.zh:
‎-嗯
‎-你喜欢穿什么就穿什么

translation.en: Because, after all, this is Mr. A Plus' attire, anyway.
translation.zh: ‎因为啊 毕竟这才是A+先生的服装嘛

translation.en: [laughing] That's right.
translation.zh: ‎没错

translation.en: Okay, I, uh,
translation.zh: ‎好嘞 ‎我等下会需要一点隐私

translation.en: will need a little bit of, um, privacy.
translation.zh: ‎我等下会需要一点隐私

translation.en: -But before I do, I've gotta fix this up. -[Cian] What? What is that?
translation.zh: ‎但在那之前 我要先把这个处理一下 ‎嗯？这是什么？

translation.en: Just little-- few hairs between the eyebrows.
translation.zh: ‎就是…眉毛之间的几根毛

translation.en: [laughing] Just-- he just cracks me up.
translation.zh: ‎真是…他真会逗我笑

translation.en: Every time.
translation.zh: ‎每一次

translation.en: We talked about what he was gonna wear last night.
translation.zh: ‎我们昨晚就讨论了他要穿什么

translation.en: Michael was going, "Well, you don't know. I might just wear my chinos."
translation.zh:
‎迈克尔说：“噢 那可说不准
‎我可能会穿卡其裤 这个那个的”

translation.en: I'm like, "Listen, Mike. Yeah, sure you will, Mike.
translation.zh:
‎迈克尔说：“噢 那可说不准
‎我可能会穿卡其裤 这个那个的” ‎“嗯 我绝对相信你 迈克
‎我知道你肯定会穿你那套西服的”

translation.en: I know you're gonna wear your suit." [laughing]
translation.zh:
‎“嗯 我绝对相信你 迈克
‎我知道你肯定会穿你那套西服的”

translation.en: [laughing] Actually, I remember when he was 13…
translation.zh: ‎对了 我记得他13岁那年…

translation.en: He came home from school,
translation.zh: ‎当时他放学回家

translation.en: and he said, "I know what I'm gonna be when I grow up."
translation.zh: ‎他说：“我知道我长大后要做什么了”

translation.en: And I said, "Really? And what's that?"
translation.zh: ‎我说：“真的吗？ 要做什么？”

translation.en: And he goes, "A gangster."
translation.zh: ‎他说：“黑帮成员”

translation.en: And I go, "Michael, why do you wanna be a gangster?"
translation.zh:
‎我说：“迈克尔呀
‎你为什么想做黑帮成员？”

translation.en: And he said, "Because they can wear suits every day to work."
translation.zh:
‎他说：“因为他们每天
‎都能穿着西装去上班”

translation.en: I said, "Hey, Mike, do you know what they have to do?"
translation.zh:
‎我说：“喂 迈克尔
‎你知道他们得干什么活吗？”

translation.en: And then I told him and I gave him, like, a mini job description,
translation.zh:
‎然后我就告诉了他
‎给了他一个简短地职位描述

translation.en: and then, he said, "Oh, no, I don't think I'll be a gangster."
translation.zh:
‎然后他就说：“噢 不
‎我好像不想做黑帮成员了”

translation.en: [Michael grunts] Done.
translation.zh: ‎穿完了

translation.en: Well, look at you, huh?
translation.zh: ‎哟 瞧瞧你

translation.en: Yep, Mr. A Plus is back.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 A+先生回来了

translation.en: [laughs] Yep, you are. I love it.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 是的 我很喜欢

translation.en: [Michael] Thanks.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢

translation.en: -[mother] You ready for tonight? Nervous? -[Michael] Yes. Not really.
translation.zh:
‎-今晚你准备好了吗？紧不紧张？
‎-准备好了 不怎么紧张

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好呀

translation.en: [Michael] Even though it's a mainstream event.
translation.zh: ‎尽管这是一个主流的活动

translation.en: It is. That's what you asked for.
translation.zh: ‎是的 按照你要求的来

translation.en: -I was a bit surprised, actually. -[Michael] Why?
translation.zh:
‎-我当时其实还挺惊讶的
‎-为什么？

translation.en: Because I'd like to encounter some women that are not on the spectrum.
translation.zh: ‎因为我想邂逅一些不在谱系中的女人

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: I wanna see what they would be like with somebody who is on the spectrum,
translation.zh:
‎我想看看她们会不会
‎想要跟一个在谱系中

translation.en: but doesn't quite seem like it.
translation.zh: ‎却又不太看得出来的人在一起

translation.en: -You just wanna see how it would work. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你只是想看看那会是个什么样
‎-是的

translation.en: But you're not opposed to dating someone on the spectrum, are you?
translation.zh: ‎但你并不反对跟在谱系中的人约会？

translation.en: -No. -You want somebody that's independent.
translation.zh:
‎-不
‎-你只是想要一个独立自主的人

translation.en: -[Michael] Yes. -Is that right?
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-是这样吗？

translation.en: But also somebody who's a girl next door type.
translation.zh: ‎而且要是邻家女孩那种类型的

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: -I better get going. -[mother] See ya. You look wonderful.
translation.zh:
‎-我该走了
‎-再见 ‎-你看起来非常棒
‎-谢谢 谢谢你

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-你看起来非常棒
‎-谢谢 谢谢你

translation.en: -[mother] Do I get a kiss? -Sure, Mom.
translation.zh:
‎-能亲我一下吗？
‎-当然 妈妈

translation.en: All right. And good luck.
translation.zh: ‎好嘞 祝你好运

translation.en: -Thank you. Take care. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 保重
‎-嗯

translation.en: -[mother] Hope you have a good time. -[Michael] I will.
translation.zh:
‎-希望你玩得开心
‎-我会的

translation.en: Hi. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎嗨

translation.en: I'm Kassandra. I'm 27, and I'm single. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我是卡珊德拉 我27岁 单身

translation.en: [Cian] Have you ever been in love?
translation.zh: ‎你有没有遇上过爱情？

translation.en: I don't know. I-- I know I love my family.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 我…我知道我爱我的家人

translation.en: I know I love my friends,
translation.zh: ‎我知道我爱我的朋友们

translation.en: but I don't know what intimate love is yet.
translation.zh:
‎但我还不知道
‎那种亲密的爱是怎样的

translation.en: I've read books,
translation.zh: ‎我在书上读到过

translation.en: both fiction and nonfiction,
translation.zh: ‎小说和非小说都有

translation.en: about what love should be,
translation.zh: ‎关于爱情应该是怎样的

translation.en: but I don't know if I've ever been in love.
translation.zh: ‎但我不知道我有没有爱过

translation.en: [Cian] How would you describe yourself?
translation.zh: ‎你会怎么描述你自己？

translation.en: Weird.
translation.zh: ‎古怪

translation.en: And I love being weird.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢自己这样古怪

translation.en: I've got a jar of teeth. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我有一罐牙齿

translation.en: [Cian] Whose teeth?
translation.zh: ‎谁的牙齿？

translation.en: They are my teeth and my siblings'.
translation.zh: ‎我的牙齿 还有我兄弟姐妹的

translation.en: I love my plush toys.
translation.zh: ‎我爱我的毛绒玩具们

translation.en: I have received a few of these from previous partners.
translation.zh: ‎有些是我之前的对象们送给我

translation.en: One of them did give me the Mewtwo to match… my Mew at the time,
translation.zh: ‎其中有一个人给了我超梦 来配… ‎我的梦幻

translation.en: 'cause we were meant to be a set.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们俩本该是一对的

translation.en: Didn't work out very well. I haven't been very lucky in love,
translation.zh:
‎最后没能成功
‎我在爱情方面一直运气不太好

translation.en: but, um, I've kept them. They're a little bit precious to me.
translation.zh:
‎但我把它们留了下来
‎它们对我来说挺珍贵的

translation.en: [Cian] Has anyone ever said to you, "You don't look autistic"?
translation.zh:
‎有没有人跟你说过：
‎“你看起来不像有自闭症？”

translation.en: Quite often. You can't see my brain. [laughs] And it's my brain that's different.
translation.zh:
‎经常有 人们看不见我的大脑
‎而我的大脑才是不一样的地方

translation.en: [Cian] When you were younger, was there a point where you started
translation.zh:
‎你小的时候
‎有没有那么一刻让你开始觉得

translation.en: to feel like you were different to the other kids at school?
translation.zh: ‎自己跟学校里的其他孩子不一样？

translation.en: It would've been about grade four, maybe grade five.
translation.zh: ‎那应该是四年级 或许五年级吧

translation.en: I remember looking up and realizing that kids sat in groups,
translation.zh:
‎我记得我抬头一看
‎发现孩子们都成群结队地坐在一起

translation.en: but I sat on my own.
translation.zh: ‎而我却独自一人坐着

translation.en: And I remember that week trying to sit in with the group,
translation.zh:
‎我记得就在那一周
‎我试着坐到大家中间去

translation.en: and it was awful.
translation.zh: ‎那真是糟透了

translation.en: And I remember that week going, "I am not the same,"
translation.zh:
‎我记得我那周一直在想
‎“我跟别人不一样”

translation.en: and it wouldn't be for three and a half years later
translation.zh: ‎从那时起 直到三年半后

translation.en: for me to get diagnosed.
translation.zh: ‎我才被确诊

translation.en: [Cian] How did you feel when you were diagnosed?
translation.zh: ‎在被确诊时 你心里有怎样的感受？

translation.en: I was happy.
translation.zh: ‎我很开心

translation.en: Having someone tell me that,
translation.zh: ‎听到别人告诉我说

translation.en: "No, this is what it is,
translation.zh: ‎“不 事情其实是这样的

translation.en: and there are thousands of other people like you,"
translation.zh: ‎而且 还有成千上万的人跟你一样”

translation.en: it made me feel human again.
translation.zh: ‎这让我感觉… ‎自己又是个正常人了

translation.en: I didn't feel completely outcast anymore.
translation.zh: ‎我不再觉得自己被完全抛弃了

translation.en: I still think it's probably one of the best days of my life.
translation.zh:
‎我到现在还认为
‎那可能是我生命中最美好的一天之一

translation.en: This is my games room.
translation.zh: ‎这里是我的游戏室

translation.en: A few years back, one of our concerts, we had a Kylie Minogue theme,
translation.zh:
‎几年前 在我们的一场演唱会上
‎我们搞了个凯莉米洛的主题

translation.en: and, uh, my sister wore this one.
translation.zh: ‎我姐姐戴了这个

translation.en: I'm planning to repurpose it into a new cosplay.
translation.zh:
‎我打算稍稍修改一下
‎把它融入到一套新的角色扮演服装里

translation.en: Um, I haven't decided exactly which character.
translation.zh: ‎我还没决定好究竟是哪个角色

translation.en: So this is one of my, um, prop daggers.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的一把道具短刀

translation.en: I also have this one.
translation.zh: ‎我还有这个

translation.en: "Winter is coming."
translation.zh: ‎“凛冬将至”

translation.en: It sits perfectly on me.
translation.zh: ‎我拿着刚刚好

translation.en: Cosplay is dressing up as your favorite characters
translation.zh:
‎角色扮演就是打扮成
‎你最喜欢人物的样子

translation.en: and bringing them to life.
translation.zh: ‎让他们活过来

translation.en: It helps with going into social situations.
translation.zh: ‎这对参加社交场合有所帮助

translation.en: I don't have to be me.
translation.zh: ‎我不必做我自己

translation.en: I can be another character,
translation.zh: ‎我可以扮演其他角色 然后呢…

translation.en: and there's a lot less stress
translation.zh: ‎我可以扮演其他角色 然后呢… ‎扮演那些角色 ‎比起我做自己的压力要小很多

translation.en: on being those characters than being myself.
translation.zh: ‎比起我做自己的压力要小很多

translation.en: One of the biggest things I've had to learn is what people call masking,
translation.zh:
‎我必须学会的最重要的技能之一
‎就是人们所谓的“伪装”

translation.en: pretending and hiding the parts of me that don't fit neurotypical society.
translation.zh:
‎通过假装将自己不适宜
‎精神典型者社会的那部分隐藏起来

translation.en: In a perfect world,
translation.zh: ‎在一个理想的世界中

translation.en: no, I wouldn't have to learn how to word things
translation.zh:
‎不 我应该不必去学习
‎该如何遣词造句

translation.en: so a neurotypical person doesn't find offense where there is none to be had,
translation.zh:
‎才不会让一个精神典型者听了
‎会觉得有被冒犯到 ‎在我无心要冒犯的情况下

translation.en: but we don't live in a perfect world.
translation.zh: ‎但我们并不是生活在理想的世界中

translation.en: -I missed you guys. -We missed you too!
translation.zh: ‎我好想你们！ ‎我们也好想你！

translation.en: So I'm thinking of starting dating again.
translation.zh: ‎我在考虑重新开始约会

translation.en: -[Kassandra] Yeah. -Awesome.
translation.zh:
‎-嗯
‎-真棒

translation.en: What kind of person would you like to meet?
translation.zh: ‎你想要遇见一个怎样的人呀？

translation.en: Um, someone that's kind of…
translation.zh: ‎你想要遇见一个怎样的人呀？ ‎一个有点像…

translation.en: kind of like us, but not 100% like us.
translation.zh:
‎有点像我们
‎但又不是跟我们完全一样的人

translation.en: -Yeah. -I think the same here.
translation.zh: ‎我也这么想

translation.en: Otherwise I probably would've dated one of you guys, and that would've been weird.
translation.zh:
‎不然的话我可能就找你们谈恋爱了
‎那样就很奇怪了

translation.en: But I guess definitely not clingy.
translation.zh: ‎我想… ‎绝对不能粘人

translation.en: You remember the last time I dated someone who was clingy.
translation.zh:
‎还记得上回
‎我跟那个粘人的家伙谈恋爱吗？

translation.en: They wanted to, like, text me morning and night.
translation.zh: ‎他想要早上晚上都给我发信息

translation.en: Like, "good morning and good night" every day.
translation.zh: ‎“早安” “晚安” 每天都是

translation.en: [woman] You just want someone to encourage your dreams,
translation.zh: ‎最好是一个会激励你追逐梦想的人

translation.en: and you encourage theirs and push each other to your goals.
translation.zh: ‎你也能激励他 互相促进达成目标

translation.en: [Kassandra] That would be so good.
translation.zh: ‎那样就太棒了

translation.en: [chuckles] It's just difficult to find, especially as an autistic adult.
translation.zh: ‎只是 真的很难找 ‎尤其是对一个有自闭症的成年人来说

translation.en: Like, if you tell people that outright, half the time they'll judge you
translation.zh:
‎如果你一开始就告诉别人
‎往往就会被他们评判

translation.en: and think you've been keeping it secret.
translation.zh: ‎以为你藏着什么秘密

translation.en: I think someone who's gonna understand you.
translation.zh: ‎我认为得是个能够理解你的人

translation.en: -You need that. -Not-- not just a little bit of you.
translation.zh:
‎-这点是必须的
‎-不只是你的一小部分

translation.en: -Like, the whole you. -Whole of you.
translation.zh:
‎-而是你的全部
‎-你的全部

translation.en: They'd also have to, like, fit in with you guys enough.
translation.zh: ‎他还必须要能跟你们打成一片

translation.en: They'll have to do, like, the nerd 101 test.
translation.zh: ‎必须要来场宅文化入门考才行

translation.en: This is gonna be good.
translation.zh: ‎肯定会很顺利的

translation.en: Like, I've got my wing person.
translation.zh: ‎我有我的僚机

translation.en: I've got my buddies.
translation.zh: ‎还有我的好伙伴们

translation.en: -I will do it. I will find someone. -We're your cheering squad. Whoo!
translation.zh:
‎-我会成功的 我会找到那个人的
‎-我们来做你的啦啦队

translation.en: [Cian] When it comes to dating, what's your greatest fear?
translation.zh:
‎在谈恋爱这件事上
‎你最大的恐惧是什么？

translation.en: [exhales] Rejection.
translation.zh: ‎被拒绝

translation.en: There's nothing more terrifying to me on this earth
translation.zh: ‎在这个世上 没有什么能比

translation.en: than a life doomed to loneliness.
translation.zh: ‎注定孤独终老让我害怕的了

translation.en: It's almost like feeling like an abandoned toy left in the closet
translation.zh:
‎那感觉几乎就像是一个
‎被遗弃在柜子里的玩具

translation.en: while all the other toys are out being played with.
translation.zh: ‎眼睁睁地看着其他玩具都被拿出去玩

translation.en: Much like how Woody was in Toy Story 4 when he was left in the closet.
translation.zh: ‎就像是《玩具总动员4》里的胡迪 ‎当他被关在柜子里时

translation.en: That's exactly how I feel a lot.
translation.zh: ‎就是那种感觉 我经常有

translation.en: [narrator] Tonight, Michael is attending a speed-dating event.
translation.zh:
‎今晚
‎迈克尔要参加一场闪电约会活动

translation.en: -[host] Hello. -[Michael] Hello.
translation.zh:
‎-你好
‎-你好

translation.en: -[host] How are you? -Good. Yourself?
translation.zh:
‎-你好吗？
‎-挺好的 你呢？

translation.en: -Do you wanna take a seat? -[Michael] Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-你要不要坐下来？
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: -Hello. How are you? -[Michael] Hello. Good. Yourself?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 你好吗？
‎-你好 挺好的 你呢？

translation.en: Well, thank you.
translation.zh: ‎挺不错的 谢谢你

translation.en: -My name's Amelia. -I'm Michael.
translation.zh:
‎-我的名字叫阿米莉娅
‎-我是迈克尔

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -Likewise.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴认识你
‎-我也一样

translation.en: -I like the outfit. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-我喜欢你的衣服
‎-多谢

translation.en: I like how the tie matches the handkerchief.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢你的领带跟手帕是相称的

translation.en: -It's actually a pocket square. -Very nice.
translation.zh:
‎-其实这是块口袋方巾
‎-真好

translation.en: What do you do in your spare time? What do you get up to?
translation.zh: ‎你平常有空都干嘛？

translation.en: Voice acting or watching television.
translation.zh: ‎配音或是看电视

translation.en: -What sort of voice acting? -There is one I've been trying lately.
translation.zh:
‎哪种配音啊？ ‎-我最近一直在练一个
‎-我很想听听看

translation.en: -Love to hear it. -[imitates Scooby-Doo]
translation.zh:
‎-我最近一直在练一个
‎-我很想听听看

translation.en: -Scooby-Dooby-Doo! -That's what I thought it was! [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-史酷比杜比杜！
‎-我听出来了！

translation.en: And there's another character. It's called Muttley.

‎罗南已经在悉尼赛车公园
‎做了整整三年的志愿者

translation.en: You hear the cars just, like, go zooming past.

[Ronan] Sorry, but if you don't move down, I'll have to call race control.

translation.zh:
‎在活动末尾
‎单身人士们会挑选出想再见面的人

translation.en: They will only be matched if the other person also chooses them.

‎-不客气

‎-我今晚就给你打电话？

‎-你也是 迈克尔 拜拜

translation.en: Pay full respect to a girl.

translation.en: Make sure your body language is positive.

translation.en: Most importantly, enjoy your lovable activities together.

‎最重要的是

translation.en: but really, like, one thing I do know,

‎我听说过…听说过朱迪

translation.en: -She'll possibly teach me a lot. -[Cian] Yeah, if you wanna see her.
translation.zh:
‎-她或许可以教我很多东西
‎-嗯 如果你想见她的话

translation.en: -You think that would that be helpful? -Yeah, it would be helpful.
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得会有帮助吗？
‎-嗯 ‎会有帮助的 因为那样的话
‎我就能得到几个…得到很多贴士

translation.en: Because then I would be given a few-- lots of tips.
translation.zh:
‎会有帮助的 因为那样的话
‎我就能得到几个…得到很多贴士

translation.en: [narrator] Jodi Rodgers is a relationship specialist who works with autistic adults,
translation.zh:
‎乔迪罗杰斯是一名情感专家
‎专门帮助有自闭症的成年人

translation.en: helping them in their search for love.
translation.zh: ‎找到他们的真爱

translation.en: Hello, I'm Jodi.
translation.zh: ‎你好 我是朱迪

translation.en: -I'm Ronan. -Lovely to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎-我是罗南
‎-很高兴认识你

translation.en: -Is it okay if I come in? -[Ronan] Pleasure. Yeah. Definitely.
translation.zh:
‎-请问我可以进来吗？
‎-幸会 可以 当然了

translation.en: [Jodi] We're not born with social skills.
translation.zh: ‎我们的社交技巧不是与生俱来的

translation.en: We are taught social skills. We're taught greetings.
translation.zh:
‎社交技巧是学来的
‎我们是被教会该怎么打招呼的

translation.en: We're taught how to have a back-and-forth conversation.
translation.zh:
‎我们是被教会
‎如何进行有来有往的对话的

translation.en: -Jodi, this is my mom. -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-朱迪 这位是我妈妈
‎-嗯

translation.en: -My mom Linda. -Hi, Jodi. I'm Linda…
translation.zh:
‎-我妈妈 琳达
‎-嗨 朱迪 ‎你好 琳达

translation.en: [Jodi] Some people have much more innate ability to pick up social skills quickly,
translation.zh: ‎有些人天生有能力快速学会社交技巧

translation.en: and for many autistic people, learning social skills is not easy.
translation.zh:
‎而对于许多有自闭症的人
‎学习社交技巧并非易事

translation.en: Here's your chair, Jodi.
translation.zh: ‎你的椅子在这里 朱迪

translation.en: [laughs] Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你

translation.en: We also have to remember that autism is as diverse
translation.zh: ‎我们也必须记得自闭症的多样性

translation.en: in people's need for support from others
translation.zh: ‎无论是在需要他人帮助的类型上

translation.en: as it is in its presentation itself.
translation.zh: ‎还是其本身的表现形式上

translation.en: So what things did you want help with today?
translation.zh: ‎那么你今天想让我帮你些什么？

translation.en: 'Cause I hear that you might be going on your first date?
translation.zh: ‎我听说你要去初次约会了？

translation.en: -The first date, yeah. -[gasps]
translation.zh: ‎初次约会 对

translation.en: So I've never been on a date before, but--
translation.zh: ‎是这样 我还从来没有约会过 但…

translation.en: but really, this is like something for me to achieve on,
translation.zh: ‎其实 这对于我来说 会是一个成就

translation.en: like a relationship as boyfriend and girlfriend.
translation.zh: ‎能够拥有一段男女朋友的关系

translation.en: So when you think about having a girlfriend,
translation.zh: ‎当你想到交到女朋友时

translation.en: what does that mean to you?
translation.zh: ‎对你来说意味着什么？

translation.en: It means, like, I feel warm and comfortable.
translation.zh: ‎意味着 我感到温暖和自在

translation.en: There's no any problems, that you're happy and calm.
translation.zh: ‎不会有任何发恼 你感到幸福而平静

translation.en: Tell you what, I wish there was no problems.
translation.zh: ‎告诉你哦 我也希望能没有烦恼

translation.en: When you have a girlfriend, there's still problems.
translation.zh:
‎但即便你有了女朋友
‎烦恼还是会有的

translation.en: -Still problems? -Still problems.
translation.zh:
‎-还会有烦恼？
‎-还会有烦恼

translation.en: -Having a girlfriend's a beautiful thing. -[Ronan] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-有女朋友是件很美好的事
‎-嗯

translation.en: But it doesn't make everything perfect.
translation.zh: ‎但这也没办反让一切都完美

translation.en: You have to really try with another person.
translation.zh:
‎跟另一个人相处
‎你必须要下很大的功夫

translation.en: It's all about looking after one another, and all of that can be really, really hard work.
translation.zh:
‎最重要的是要互相照顾
‎而做到这点需要很努力才行

translation.en: -Yeah. -But it's like driving the fastest car
translation.zh: ‎但这就像是开着最快的车

translation.en: on the hardest track.
translation.zh: ‎行驶在最难的赛道上

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎嗯

translation.en: Would you say, "No, no, I don't wanna do that because it's too hard,"
translation.zh: ‎你会说： ‎“不 我不想做这件事 因为这太难了”

translation.en: or would you be brave and give it a go?
translation.zh: ‎还是会勇敢地去尝试一下？

translation.en: I would be brave and give it a go.
translation.zh: ‎我会勇敢地尝试一下

translation.en: That's just what building a relationship's like.
translation.zh: ‎经营两人的关系就是这样的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎嗯

translation.en: If you go on your very first date,
translation.zh: ‎如果你去约第一次会

translation.en: how do you think you're gonna feel on your first date?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得在初次约会的时候
‎你会有怎样的感觉？

translation.en: Well, most people would feel a bit nervous.
translation.zh: ‎这个嘛 大多数人会感到有点紧张

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: But I'm brave and-- and I'm excited, like--
translation.zh:
‎但我很勇敢 而且…
‎而且我很兴奋 那个…

translation.en: like, doing something new and special that I've never done before.
translation.zh:
‎做一件全新的、特别的
‎我从来没做过的事

translation.en: That is so excellent.
translation.zh: ‎这样太棒了

translation.en: That is such a good way to think about the world.
translation.zh: ‎这可真是一种看待这个世界的好思维

translation.en: So what do you think that you need help from me with,
translation.zh: ‎既然你很勇敢 也很兴奋

translation.en: if you're brave and excited?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得需要我帮你些什么呢？

translation.en: So, really, like, something for me to learn
translation.zh: ‎就是那个…我想要学的

translation.en: on having a date is, like, conversation driving,
translation.zh: ‎在约会上要用的…比如怎么推动对话

translation.en: as in showing a lot of interest
translation.zh: ‎表现出你很感兴趣

translation.en: and you're involved, and you wanna discuss more.
translation.zh: ‎你很投入 你想要进一步地讨论

translation.en: I reckon we should have a bit of a practice, you and me,
translation.zh:
‎或许我们应该来演练一下
‎你和我 看看你是怎么…

translation.en: just at how you'll get-- how you could keep the conversation going.
translation.zh:
‎或许我们应该来演练一下
‎你和我 看看你是怎么… ‎你是怎么样把对话推动下去的

translation.en: Or maybe you can pretend you're going on a picnic together.
translation.zh: ‎或许你们可以假装一起去野餐

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Jodi] Come into the kitchen.
translation.zh:
‎-好啊
‎-到厨房里来

translation.en: -Is that all right? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这样可以吗？
‎-可以

translation.en: [Jodi] So, if you and I pretend we're outside and we're actually at the picnic,
translation.zh:
‎好了 如果你和我假装在外面
‎我们现在真的在野餐

translation.en: what activities will you do on the picnic?
translation.zh: ‎野餐的时候你会做什么活动？

translation.en: There's, like, Frisbee.
translation.zh: ‎可以…玩飞盘

translation.en: So you have a conversation about the Frisbee with me.
translation.zh:
‎好 那你来跟我进行一段
‎关于飞盘的对话

translation.en: -Get me in on the conversation. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-将我包含进去
‎-好

translation.en: Like, do you like playing Frisbee?
translation.zh: ‎你喜欢玩飞盘吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: ‎喜欢

translation.en: -How about we play Frisbee together? -Oh, that'd be lovely.
translation.zh:
‎-我们一起玩飞盘怎么样？
‎-那就太好啦

translation.en: So it's really like-- really like throwing the ball and catching it,
translation.zh: ‎这其实就像…就像丢球接球一样

translation.en: but instead, it's different with a Frisbee.
translation.zh: ‎区别就是 用的不是球 是飞盘

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: It'd be great, so…
translation.zh: ‎那就太棒了 那个…

translation.en: -Can I show you something? -Yeah, um… Can I just use Mom's pen?
translation.zh:
‎我能给你看样东西吗？
‎我能用下妈妈的笔吗？

translation.en: -Come here with me for a sec. -Am I-- am I not paying attention?
translation.zh:
‎-跟我过来一下
‎-我是不是…我是不是不够专心？

translation.en: No, no, you're doing a great job. I'm so impressed with you.
translation.zh: ‎不 你做得很好 我觉得你很棒

translation.en: What's that say?
translation.zh: ‎上面写了什么？

translation.en: [Ronan] That's a "no."
translation.zh: ‎是一个“否”

translation.en: -[Jodi] And what's this one say? -[Ronan] "Yes." [Jodi] All right.
translation.zh:
‎-那这个呢？
‎-是一个“是”

translation.en: When we ask people questions that finish with--
translation.zh: ‎当我们问别人问题 答案是以…

translation.en: Oh, no. It has to be, like, just what, who and how questions.
translation.zh:
‎对哦 只能问“什么”、“谁”
‎和“怎么样”的问题

translation.en: Now you're on it. Now you're on it.
translation.zh: ‎这下你上路了

translation.en: Because if you just said to me, "How would you--"
translation.zh: ‎因为如果你只跟我说：“我们一起…

translation.en: -Uh, what did you say about--? -"How'd you like to play Frisbee with me?"
translation.zh:
‎-你刚才怎么说的来着?
‎-“我们一起玩飞盘怎么样？”

translation.en: Yes, I would.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 好的

translation.en: Oh, no, that wasn't-- that wouldn't be enough.
translation.zh: ‎不对了 这问题不是…这样是不够的

translation.en: It can't-- it cannot be-- it cannot be yes or no question.
translation.zh: ‎不能…不能问 不能问“是或否”的问题

translation.en: Has to be only what, who and how and where.
translation.zh:
‎只能问“什么”、“谁”
‎“怎么样”、“哪里”

translation.en: No, no, you can definitely have yes or no,
translation.zh: ‎不 问“是或否”绝对是可以的

translation.en: but then if I wanted to keep you talking, what would be another question I'd ask?
translation.zh:
‎可接下来 如果我想让你继续说的话
‎我下一个问题应该问什么？

translation.en: What cars-- why don't you like Fords?
translation.zh: ‎什么车…你为什么不喜欢福特？

translation.en: Perfect. See? You know all of those techniques.
translation.zh: ‎完美 你看吧？这些技巧你其实都懂

translation.en: What, who, where and how and why?
translation.zh:
‎“什么”、“谁”、“哪里”
‎还有“怎么样”和“为什么”？

translation.en: Yeah, you're brilliant at this. So now let's have another practice.
translation.zh:
‎对 你很擅长这个嘛
‎那我们来进行下一个练习吧

translation.en: What other activities will you do on your picnic?
translation.zh: ‎你还会进行什么别的活动？

translation.en: Maybe we could walk along the beach together.
translation.zh: ‎或许我们可以一起沿着海滩散步

translation.en: I'd love that. I love walking along the beach.
translation.zh: ‎我很乐意 ‎我爱沿着海滩散步

translation.en: So wh-- why do you like walking along the beach?
translation.zh: ‎那你…你为什么喜欢沿着海滩散步？

translation.en: [Jodi chuckles] Now you got it.
translation.zh: ‎现在你懂了

translation.en: So you don't need to worry about it.
translation.zh: ‎好了 你不用太担心的

translation.en: You're a really great communicator, Ronan. Really good.
translation.zh: ‎你是个很棒的沟通者 罗南 非常的棒

translation.en: This is just you being you.
translation.zh: ‎你只要做自己就行

translation.en: I'm hanging to hear about this first date.
translation.zh: ‎我很期待听到你初次约会的情况

translation.en: -[Linda chuckles] Yeah. -Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎嗯

translation.en: You're definitely gonna contact me and let me know how it goes?
translation.zh:
‎你一定要联系我
‎让我知道顺利不顺利好吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, definitely. -[Jodi] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 一定的

translation.en: Because I'll be having that feeling to going,
translation.zh: ‎因为我会一直在想着

translation.en: "Hope it goes good. Hope it goes good. Hope it goes good."
translation.zh: ‎“希望很顺利”

translation.en: -Yeah! -[laughing]
translation.zh: ‎是啊！

translation.en: You're gonna be brilliant.
translation.zh: ‎你肯定会表现得很棒的

translation.en: Always.
translation.zh: ‎会的

translation.en: [Jodi] Now, do you wanna walk me out to the door?
translation.zh: ‎好了 你要不要送我出门？

translation.en: [Ronan] Yeah, definitely.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 当然了

translation.en: Ronan has so much to offer
translation.zh: ‎罗南有很多优势

translation.en: because he's got so many different interests and skills
translation.zh: ‎因为他有好多不同的兴趣和技能

translation.en: that other people will find really, really appealing.
translation.zh: ‎全是别人会感到很有吸引力的

translation.en: I think any girl that gets to go on a date with Ronan
translation.zh: ‎我认为任何能跟罗南约会的女孩

translation.en: is going to be a really, really lucky girl.
translation.zh: ‎一定会个很幸运的女孩

translation.en: -That's been a really fun afternoon. -Yeah, it was a pleasure.
translation.zh:
‎-今天下午过得真愉快
‎-嗯 是我的荣幸

translation.en: -[Jodi chuckles] Thank you. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你
‎-谢谢

translation.en: -Catch you later, Jodi. -[Jodi] See ya.
translation.zh:
‎-回头见 朱迪
‎-再见

translation.en: [narrator] Kassandra is getting ready to step out on her first date in months.
translation.zh:
‎此时的卡珊德拉
‎正在为她数月来的第一次约会做准备

translation.en: Kassandra is meeting Tom.
translation.zh: ‎卡珊德拉要见的人是汤姆

translation.en: He likes scratching a dog's itch
translation.zh: ‎他喜欢替狗狗抓痒

translation.en: and playing guitar rock.
translation.zh: ‎弹摇滚吉他

translation.en: He doesn't like windy days
translation.zh: ‎他不喜欢大风天

translation.en: or crooked pictures on walls.
translation.zh: ‎或是墙上挂歪了的画

translation.en: -Hi, there. -Hello. How are you going?
translation.zh:
‎-你好啊
‎-你好 你怎么样？

translation.en: -Good. My name's Kass. -I'm Tom.
translation.zh:
‎-挺好的 我叫卡珊
‎-我是汤姆

translation.en: -Nice to meet you, Tom. -Likewise.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴认识你 汤姆
‎-我也是

translation.en: You look good. I like your shirt.
translation.zh: ‎你看起来真不错 我喜欢你的衬衫

translation.en: Thanks. It's a shirt from a John Lennon design collection.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 这件衬衫是一个
‎约翰列侬设计系列里的

translation.en: -Oh, I love John Lennon. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎我爱约翰列侬

translation.en: -Um, should we go inside? -Let's.
translation.zh:
‎-要不我们进去吧？
‎-好的

translation.en: -[laughs] Hi! -Hey.
So, um, you might be able to tell 'cause of the long hair,
translation.zh:
‎那个 你可能已经看出来了
‎因为我留着长头发

translation.en: I really, um, I really love music.
translation.zh: ‎我非常…我非常爱音乐

translation.en: -[Kassandra] Mm-hmm. -So, um, yeah, so, um…
translation.zh: ‎那个…

translation.en: Yeah, I grew up listening to The Beatles, um, and Led Zeppelin really early,
translation.zh:
‎对 我是听着披头士
‎还有齐柏林飞艇长大的 很小就听

translation.en: and then I got into Queen and, um, and all-- all kind-- I've got--
translation.zh: ‎然后我开始听皇后乐队 然后… ‎各种…各种各样的…我开始…

translation.en: I have all of these bands that have just influenced who I am today.
translation.zh:
‎受了所有这些乐队的影响
‎才有了今天的我

translation.en: -I'm a dance teacher. -Nice.
translation.zh:
‎-我是个舞蹈老师
‎-真好

translation.en: So I listen to a lot of different styles of music as well.
translation.zh: ‎所以我会听很多不同风格的音乐

translation.en: -Excellent. -And I've performed in musical theater.
translation.zh:
‎-棒极了
‎-然后我还表演过音乐剧

translation.en: Okay, what have you performed in? [chuckles] Uh, most recently, it was Shrek The Musical.
translation.zh:
‎-你都表演过什么？
‎-最近的是《怪物史瑞克》音乐剧

translation.en: Oh, uh, in the professional cast, was it?
translation.zh: ‎是跟专业演员一起 对吧？

translation.en: Um, no, it was in the community theater.
translation.zh: ‎不 是在社区剧院里演的

translation.en: Okay, um, yeah, so we had a production of, um, Shrek The Musical at my work
translation.zh: ‎哦 对 我工作的地方几年前演过一场

translation.en: a few years ago with Jay Laga'aia playing the title role.
translation.zh:
‎《怪物史瑞克》音乐剧
‎杰拉加雅演的主角

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, I came and watched that one. -Nice.
translation.zh:
‎-对哦 那一场我来看过
‎-真好

translation.en: -That's awesome. -Excellent.
translation.zh:
‎-非常好看
‎-真棒

translation.en: I really do like your shirt. That is really cool.
translation.zh: ‎我真的很喜欢你的衬衫 真的很酷

translation.en: Yeah, I've got a-- I've got, um, two more John Lennon-designed shirts.
translation.zh:
‎哦 我还有…我还有两件
‎也是约翰列侬设计的衬衫

translation.en: Um, I could've worn one of them.
translation.zh: ‎我本来可以穿那两件的

translation.en: Unfort-- unfortunately, um, this-- Actually, this one-- start that one again.
translation.zh:
‎不幸…不幸的是 这…
‎其实这一件…重头开始说

translation.en: So, um, this one, uh, was probably the best one, uh, for me to choose.
translation.zh: ‎所以 可能我选这件才是最合适的

translation.en: -Awesome. Well, it looks good. -Mm-hmm. Thanks. Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎真棒 是挺好看的 ‎谢谢

translation.en: Um, yeah, so… [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎是的 那么…

translation.en: So, um, so what's the dress you're wearing there?
translation.zh: ‎那么 你穿的这条裙子是什么来头？

translation.en: Um, it's from Princess Highway. It's, um, the Musgrave Bunny dress.
translation.zh:
‎这是Princess Highway牌的
‎马斯格雷夫兔子裙

translation.en: Ah, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是

translation.en: My mom likes to get a lot of clothes for me that are "alternative fashion."
translation.zh:
‎我妈很喜欢给我买很多
‎小众潮流的衣服

translation.en: -Okay. -Um…
translation.zh: ‎哦

translation.en: -Yeah. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎是啊

translation.en: Would-- would you like to get a drink?
translation.zh: ‎要不要喝一杯？

translation.en: -Yeah, okay. -Nice.
translation.zh:
‎-嗯 好啊
‎-太好了

translation.en: What do you do for, I guess, fun?
translation.zh:
‎你平时都做些什么来…
‎这么说吧 休闲？

translation.en: Um, I-- I, um, I generally, um--
translation.zh: ‎我…我一般…

translation.en: What I've been doing is, um, sorting out all of my family's music collections,
translation.zh:
‎我平时一直在做的
‎就是整理我家族的音乐收藏

translation.en: both, uh, digitally at the moment,
translation.zh: ‎不仅是数字化的收藏

translation.en: and I'm doing our vinyl records and CDs at the moment too.
translation.zh:
‎现在我还在整理
‎我们的黑胶唱片和CD

translation.en: One of the records that I've been listening to quite a bit
translation.zh: ‎其中有一张唱片 我最近经常在听

translation.en: is, um, OK Computer by Radiohead.
translation.zh: ‎是电台司令的《OK Computer》

translation.en: Okay, I didn't think they'd have records.
translation.zh: ‎哦 我都不知道他们会出黑胶唱片呢

translation.en: -Yeah. -Wow.
translation.zh:
‎-有的
‎-哇喔

translation.en: -[chuckles] That's really cool. Sorry. -That's all right.
translation.zh:
‎-真的非常酷 抱歉
‎-没关系

translation.en: -Um, I'm just a bit nervous. -Um, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我只是有点紧张
‎-嗯
